about_the_game:
• Gameplay Focused on the classic style of the award-winning Resident Evil 4.

  • Investigate and get involved in the world of scp, starting here a journey that will expands to worlds and totally unexpected situations in the next chapters.

  • Save your few ammo and walk carefully, watch for sounds, use your flashlights wisely. Your strategy must be carefully planned.

  • Welcome to the first part of this adventure based on the stories of Jacob Conwell. [/]

    - This first part of the story is told from the point of view of a member of the "Gamma 13" task force, the "Assimov Lawbringers" : a team specialized in apprehending anomalous robots - whose operation defies traditional science and has proven to be incredibly dangerous if misused.

    What started as a simple mission to seize one of these machines quickly became something much bigger, more dangerous, and with many more involved
    unexpected , so in this chapter you will need to manage your resources, be careful with your movement and plan your actions.



    • - In this chapter you will have to deal with the Pilgrim androids, the new merlin drones, and find the first references to the actions of "Nobody" a mysterious figure who can be both your ally and not to be.

    • - Explore an SCP adventure that is not more one containment breach.

    • - Discover and understand how the plot unfolds by reading messages left on notebooks and tablets, but always wonder why you could find such a device, completely unlocked without passwords and plus, with exposed messages.

    • - You and your task force are in Brazil, and this has an older and more frightening reason than you probably think. And that's exactly why you need to go ahead.

    • - You won't have a radio, at least at the beginning, there was no reason to think that something would go wrong, but for a change, there is always something going wrong. in MTF-Gamma 13 things always go wrong even when they go right.

content_descriptors.notes: this game contains explosion and throwing of mechanical bodies, shocks and electrical discharges without visual damage such as burns.

detailed_description:
• Gameplay Focused on the classic style of the award-winning Resident Evil 4.

  • Investigate and get involved in the world of scp, starting here a journey that will expands to worlds and totally unexpected situations in the next chapters.

  • Save your few ammo and walk carefully, watch for sounds, use your flashlights wisely. Your strategy must be carefully planned.

  • Welcome to the first part of this adventure based on the stories of Jacob Conwell. [/]

    - This first part of the story is told from the point of view of a member of the "Gamma 13" task force, the "Assimov Lawbringers" : a team specialized in apprehending anomalous robots - whose operation defies traditional science and has proven to be incredibly dangerous if misused.

    What started as a simple mission to seize one of these machines quickly became something much bigger, more dangerous, and with many more involved
    unexpected , so in this chapter you will need to manage your resources, be careful with your movement and plan your actions.



    • - In this chapter you will have to deal with the Pilgrim androids, the new merlin drones, and find the first references to the actions of "Nobody" a mysterious figure who can be both your ally and not to be.

    • - Explore an SCP adventure that is not more one containment breach.

    • - Discover and understand how the plot unfolds by reading messages left on notebooks and tablets, but always wonder why you could find such a device, completely unlocked without passwords and plus, with exposed messages.

    • - You and your task force are in Brazil, and this has an older and more frightening reason than you probably think. And that's exactly why you need to go ahead.

    • - You won't have a radio, at least at the beginning, there was no reason to think that something would go wrong, but for a change, there is always something going wrong. in MTF-Gamma 13 things always go wrong even when they go right.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: Celeron dual core 1.5Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 or something equivalent with openGL-1.4
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: you can start the game using the "-opengl14" parameter, but expect some glitches on lights
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu up-to-date
  • Processor: Any Ryzen 5 or intel equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 600 and up, AMD series HD 7730 and up or any Vulkan - Enabled Video Card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: TaskForce Gamma-13 : An SCP Tale

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy TaskForce Gamma-13 : An SCP Tale

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Celeron dual core 1.5Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: intel HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Any Ryzen 5 or intel equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: The idea was to capture a wasp, but you found a nest...This game is a third person shooter , an combination of Resident Evil 4 with Splinter Cell and Gears of Wars, where you, a member of the Gamma-13 task force should recover a lost android, but found much more than expected.
